statements: SELECT id, property_type, assessed_value, appraisal_date, underwriting_criteria FROM home_assessments;
SELECT property_type, assessed_value, appraisal_date FROM home_assessments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, property_type FROM home_assessments WHERE assessed_value > 100000;
SELECT * FROM home_assessments WHERE appraisal_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT property_type, MAX(assessed_value) AS max_value FROM home_assessments GROUP BY property_type;
SELECT * FROM home_assessments WHERE id = 1
SELECT property_type, assessed_value FROM home_assessments WHERE assessed_value > 50000 ORDER BY appraisal_date DESC
SELECT id, property_type FROM home_assessments WHERE property_type = 'Condo' ORDER BY assessed_value ASC
SELECT * FROM home_assessments WHERE property_type = 'Single Family' AND appraisal_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, property_type, assessed_value, appraisal_date FROM home_assessments WHERE underwriting_criteria LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM home_assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, address, assessment_value FROM home_assessments ORDER BY assessment_value DESC;
SELECT address, assessment_value FROM home_assessments WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM appraisals WHERE appraisal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT appraiser_name, AVG(appraised_value) AS avg_appraised_value FROM appraisals GROUP BY appraiser_name;
SELECT * FROM appraisals WHERE appraised_value > 500000 ORDER BY appraisal_date DESC;
SELECT appraisal_id, appraisal_date, appraised_value FROM appraisals WHERE appraiser_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT h.address, a.appraisal_date, a.appraised_value FROM home_assessments h INNER JOIN appraisals a ON h.assessment_id = a.assessment_id;
SELECT h.address, a.appraisal_date, a.appraised_value FROM home_assessments h INNER JOIN appraisals a ON h.assessment_id = a.assessment_id WHERE h.address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT h.address, a.appraisal_date, a.appraised_value FROM home_assessments h INNER JOIN appraisals a ON h.assessment_id = a.assessment_id GROUP BY h.address ORDER BY COUNT(a.appraisal_id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM HomeAssessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT property_address, appraisal_value FROM HomeAssessments WHERE appraisal_value > 500000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM PolicyUnderwriting WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM AssessmentLogs WHERE log_timestamp < '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
SELECT assessment_id, appraiser_name, property_address FROM HomeAssessments INNER JOIN AssessmentLogs ON HomeAssessments.assessment_id = AssessmentLogs.assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM HomeAssessments WHERE appraisal_value > 50000 ORDER BY appraisal_value DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, property_address, appraisal_value FROM HomeAssessments WHERE assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PolicyUnderwriting WHERE risk_factor = 'High' ORDER BY policy_start_date;
SELECT assessment_id, property_address, appraiser_name FROM HomeAssessments WHERE appraisal_value BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM AssessmentLogs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM home_assessments;
SELECT id, address, area_sqft FROM home_assessments ORDER BY area_sqft DESC;
SELECT appraisal_date, appraiser_name, appraisal_value FROM appraisals WHERE appraisal_value > 50000;
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder FROM policy_underwriting WHERE assessment_id = 1001;
SELECT id, policy_holder, policy_type FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY policy_holder ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM home_assessments;
SELECT address, area_sqft FROM home_assessments ORDER BY area_sqft DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT appraisal_date, appraisal_value FROM appraisals WHERE appraisal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY appraisal_value DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_holder, policy_type FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY policy_holder ASC;
SELECT * FROM home_assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, property_address, appraised_value, assessment_date FROM home_assessments;
SELECT * FROM policy_underwriting ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM policy_underwriting WHERE policy_type = 'Home';
SELECT appraisal_id, appraisal_date, property_condition, appraisal_value FROM appraisals ORDER BY appraisal_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM home_assessments;
SELECT property_address, appraised_value FROM home_assessments WHERE appraised_value > 100000;
SELECT a.assessment_date, p.policy_type FROM home_assessments a INNER JOIN policy_underwriting p ON a.assessment_id = p.policy_id;
SELECT appraisal_date, property_condition FROM appraisals ORDER BY appraisal_value DESC;
SELECT a.assessment_id, ad.assessor_name, ad.assessment_notes FROM home_assessments a LEFT JOIN assessment_details ad ON a.assessment_id = ad.assessment_id;
